member.name: T:System.Management.Instrumentation.DefaultManagementInstaller
member.summary: Installs an instrumented assembly. To use this default project installer, simply derive a class from inside the assembly. No methods need to be overridden.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.DefaultManagementInstaller.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This is the default constructor.

member.name: T:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager
member.summary: Provides methods that manage the lifetime and the model used for decoupled providers.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager.Publish(System.Object)
member.summary: Makes an instance of a provider available within the WMI infrastructure.
member.param: An instance of the class that implements the provider to publish.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager.RegisterAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Registers an assembly with the WMI infrastructure.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager.RegisterType(System.Type)
member.summary: Registers a class with the WMI infrastructure.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager.Revoke(System.Object)
member.summary: Takes an instance of a currently available provider and makes it unavailable within the WMI infrastructure.
member.param: An instance of the class that implements the provider to revoke.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager.UnregisterAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Unregisters an assembly currently registered with the WMI infrastructure.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationManager.UnregisterType(System.Type)
member.summary: Unregisters a class registered with the WMI infrastructure.

member.name: T:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagedCommonProvider
member.summary: The class is used internally by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions infrastructure.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagedCommonProvider.#ctor
member.summary: This is the default constructor for which is used internally by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions infrastructure.

member.name: T:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierAttribute
member.summary: The ManagementQualifier attribute contains additional WMI provider-related information about an associated WMI class, instance, property, field or method.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the ManagementQualifierAttribute.

member.name: P:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierAttribute.Flavor
member.summary: Flavor of the attribute.
member.returns: Returns a ManagementQualifierFlavor that indicates the flavor of the qualifier.

member.name: P:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of the qualifier.
member.returns: Returns a string containing the name of the qualifier.

member.name: P:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierAttribute.Value
member.summary: Value associated with the qualifier.
member.returns: Returns an object that represents the value of the qualifier.

member.name: T:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors
member.summary: Qualifier flavors that can be used with WMI provider extensions.

member.name: F:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors.Amended
member.summary: The qualifier is not required in the basic class definition and can be moved to the amendment to be localized.

member.name: F:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors.DisableOverride
member.summary: The qualifier cannot be overridden in a derived class or instance. Note that being able to override a propagated qualifier is the default.

member.name: F:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors.ClassOnly
member.summary: The qualifier is propagated to instances.

member.name: F:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors.ThisClassOnly
member.summary: The qualifier is not propagated to derived classes.

member.name: T:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiProviderInstallationException
member.summary: Represents an exception to throw when WMI provider installation fails.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiProviderInstallationException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This is the default constructor.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiProviderInstallationException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialization information.
member.param: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
Description of the source and destination of the specified serialized stream.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiProviderInstallationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a message that describes the exception.

member.name: M:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiProviderInstallationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new class with the specified string and exception.
member.param: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
